cover.alt: The Fall of the House of Usher poster. A woman holds a black raven masquerade mask, peering out from behind it in pitch darkness.

title: The Fall of the House of Usher

cover.alt: The Monkey poster. A creepy, grimacing toy monkey glares ominously from the darkness.
The Substance poster. A naked woman lies on the floor of a white tiled bathroom. Along her spine is a large red surgical scar.

Parasyte: The Grey poster. Various characters stand in a street. Some hold weapons, while others have vicious-looking alien growths instead of faces. The main character, Jeong Soo-in, has half of her face mutated with an alien parasite.
Glass poster. Characters Elijah Price and David Dunn flank three personas of Kevin, all separated by lines in shattered glass. In the bottom fragment is a psychiatric hospital.

Unbreakable poster. Characters David Dunn and Elijah Price look moodily in opposite directions into the darkness. Between them is a cloaked, silhouetted figure. A shattered glass effect separates the two characters.
Split poster. A close-up of the main character, Kevin, frowning. A shattered glass effect splits his face into multiple fragments.

Nosferatu poster. Main character Ellen Hutter is reclined amongst lilac flowers as a clawed hand caresses her face. The title is in gothic script below the tagline, which reads 'Succumb to the darkness'.
Beetlejuice Beetlejuice poster. Beetlejuice sits on an old house, surrounded by the film's characters.
Alien: Romulus poster. A facehugger alien is attached to a person's face, its tail wrapped around their neck.
Underwater poster. The main character, Norah, wears a fretful expression inside a sci-fi diving helmet surrounded by bubbles, lit with a glow amidst darkness.
Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny poster. An illustration of an older Indiana Jones poses with his iconic costume and whip, surrounded by the film's characters.

title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny

cover.alt: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story poster. An illustration of the main character Jyn Erso, surrounded by Rebel and Empire forces. The Death Star and Darth Vader's mask loom in the background.

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

cover.alt: Andor poster. An illustration of the main character Cassian Andor, surrounded by other characters. The sun rises behind him and various starships fly around the various characters.
Prey poster. The main character Naru's face is smeared in the Predator's green glowing blood. The three red laser beams of the Predator's weapon are reflected in her eye.
Scavengers Reign poster. One of the characters, Azi, stands atop a strange rock formation, resting against an alien structure. Alien creatures fly in the pink sky.
They Cloned Tyrone poster. Several character's heads are arranged in an arc, most of which are the main character's, Tyrone. The tagline reads, 'Damn...'.
Ghostbusters: Afterlife poster. Under a supernatural stormy sky, the iconic Ecto-1 vintage Ghostbusters ambulance is parked in a field, surrounded by the main characters looking around cautiously.

JUNG_E poster. A humanoid robot stands menacingly in the centre holding an assault rifle, flanked on either side by other characters and attack robots. A close-up of the titular main character's face is above them, all against a futuristic backdrop.
